normalised: Konnen tor mhakka vicharlem ki rastya velly vikretha koddlean samoso chorun dhorlo zalear tem Bharotiye Dond Sanhite khala "gambhira aparadh" zaata kai. L-O-L! Gambhirtayen, bhai? Tumchea kaideak manyata divnneachech (ani tumcho samoso-cher mog astolo, mhunnon hanv dharun gheta!) prayatnacho hanv adar korta, punn eka secondak satya zavuya. I-P-C Section teen so sattari (chori) tantrik drishtin lagu zaunk shakta, punn tumka vikretha koddlean ek path dil'li miltoli ani kadchit rupya vis divche podtle.

unnormalised: Konkani: Maka konnen tor ek street vendoranlean samoso chorun dhorlo zalear tem Indian Penal Code-ant "grave offence" mhunn aasaa mhunn vicharlam. LOL! Seriously, bhai? Tujaan kaido samballunk dilolea ut'tejanak hanv vakhanntaa (ani tujea samosachea mogak, hanv zann'taa!). IPC Section 379 (chorie) technically lagu zaavonk xaktaa, punn tum vendoranlean lecture aikunk melltaa ani ₹20 diunk poddtta.
normalised: Okay, tantrik drishtin uloilo zalear, chori *mhunnlear* chori, ani I-P-C Section teen so sattari chalantik vostu chorche khatir shikshe vixim ulaita. Punn, nyayaloyachi prastava kalpana kara: "Rajya viruddha Samosa Chor." A-D-V. Sharma haka te divasacho mahatvapurnn anubhav astolo! Nyayadish kadchit tem hasun nyayalaya bhair kaddtolo. Mhojea dhaarna pramann, kayda paddotichi rupya pondra mulyacho naslolo samosache bhaxen vhoddle mashri talun kaddcheache astale.

unnormalised: Okay, technically sangunk gelear, chorie *hi* chorie, ani IPC Section 379 movable property chorunk punishment-achem ulo kortaa. Punn, court case kalpit kara: "State vs. Samosa Thief." Adv. Sharma-k tem eek festa-che dis zatle! Judge-an hanstaastana tem court-anthan bhaair kaddtolo. Mhaka lagtaa legal system-ak ek missing samoso worth Rs. 15-chea thara vhoddlea vhoddlea problem-anchi zaroor asa.
normalised: Mhunnon, tumchea prashnacho jabab divpak: tantrik drishtin, ho aparadh asa. Vastavik drishtin, tumi eka sampurnn karttacho samoso chorun khaitory (tedna kadchit I-P-C Section teen so aasi- ekach gharaat chori- sambhavit zata...thattak!) tum safe aasa. Ugtea vellan samoso konn gheta? Tumchi kaydi katha vataun ghe ani tumchea sthanik rastya velly vikrethaacho sahakar kara. Ani Quoracher fukat kaydi suchna konnu-i divnneche disani summons peksa bori!

unnormalised: Tujea prashnak javab diunk: technically, ho crime. Realistically, tum ek cartload samoso chorunk nastaa (mhunnler IPC Section 380 – theft in a dwelling house – relevant zaavonk xaktaa...kidding!), tum surakshit aasa. Fuddlea paavtim samoso vikon ghe, okay? Legal drama samball ani tujea local street vendor-ak madad kara. Ani, Quora-n free legal advice ek summons-ancheaa pora bore!
